aka: Pakistan: À la rencontre du peuple Kalash
The Kalash of the Hindu Kush
this_title: Die Ungläubigen vom Hindukusch: Die bunte Kultur der Kalasha
trans_title: Pakistan: À la rencontre du peuple Kalash
The Kalash of the Hindu Kush
introduction: In the remote valleys of the Hindu Kush live the Kalash people, the smallest ethnic minority in Pakistan. With a distinct culture and polytheistic religion, they are said to be descendants of Alexander the Great’s troops. But modern life is reaching their valleys and their culture and way of live is under threat.
chinese_title: Die Ungläubigen vom Hindukusch: Die bunte Kultur der Kalasha
